Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CmDef (C. malabaricus defensin, natural AMPs, fish, animals, 3S=S, UCSS1a; BBMm; rCmDef)

Literature.Author: Athira PP, Anju MV, Anooja VV, Archana K, Neelima S, Muhammed Musthafa S, Bright Singh IS, Philip R 3
Literature.Title: A Novel Beta-Defensin Isoform from Malabar Trevally, Carangoides malabaricus (Bloch & Schneider, 1801), an Arsenal Against Fish Bacterial Pathogens: Molecular Characterization, Recombinant Production, and Mechanism of Action.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (67.44%) topdBD-2R: 16%, C: 14%, Y: 12%. GRAVY: -1.05; Mol Wt: 5223.936; mol formula: C221H328N71O63S7; mol ex coeff: 13375.Gene Bank.Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli:  rCmDef was expressed in RosettagamiTMB (DE3) pLysS as a thioredoxin fusion.Activity: active against fish pathogens: V. proteolyticus (MIC 8 uM), A. hydrophila (MIC 32 uM). It also showed inhibition of E. tarda by 94%  and V. harveyi by 54% at 32 uM.  no activity V.fluvialis and V.alginolyticus.  Warning: other bacteria not tested.MOA:bacteria:  act on membranes (e.g., PI).In vitro toxicity:  human RBC: no hemolysis till 32 uM.
